content.rendered: We couldn’t NOT share our favorite egg salad recipe. Made according to the old recipe of one of the Polish grandmas from Nowy Sącz is a staple dish that whenever someone makes at home, lasts usually for just one day. The secret lies in the cooked ham which, mixed with green onions, mayonnaise and – of course – eggs,  creates this delightful and fulfilling flavor. And you only need four ingredients! Make it at home and you’ll crave it for breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
